about_the_game:
Void: Icarus Game and Lore.

Void: Icarus is the 2D, shooter, side-scroller game where you can't die. Thanks to a belt device made with both human and alien technology Icarus, our hero, finds himself into a conspirancy orquested by the alien race named as: The Cosmonauts, and he must discover what's behind of all of this.

Is the year 2074. The Cosmonauts arrived and conquered Earth 14 years ago. Follow the story as you find along with Daisy and Icarus a way out of The Void city.

Void: Icarus Contains.

  • An Original small Story about Love and Aliens (Separately).
  • Original Soundtrack perfectly fitting our story telling.
  • Simple Pixel Art in company of Unreal Engine 5 light system and handmade normal maps.
  • Simple Mechanics.
  • Shoot, Jump and Duck
  • Small Game with Laser weapons.
  • Story, programming and pixel art made by one single person
  • EDM/Hip-Hop Music with one Male and one Female voices.
  • Multiple Bosses
  • Flying Chases.
  • A Post-Alien Conquest world.
  • Find out what The Void represents in this Universe.

About Icarus:

  • Our main character, a 20 years old guy who is lost in an emotional crisis. He used to do drugs, but now that his body is clear he has to find himself and be ready to anything that comes with the future.

About Daisy:

  • Icarus girlfriend, smart and sweet. Knows everything Icarus has been throught, but also knows that they have potencial to have a better live together.

About Flying Chases:

  • Is the year 2074 and there is alien technology, of course there will be Flying Cars. Vehicles that have flying system and still have tires are called Hybrids.

short_description: Is the year 2074. The alien race named as the Cosmonauts arrived and conquered Earth 14 years ago. In this 2D Side-Scroll Shooter everything goes around Icarus, our main character, who got his hands on a strange artifact capable of save it's bearer from certain death.
